about_the_game:
GANG BEASTS Original Soundtrack is a banger jubilee, filled with 80's movie music feels atop bass heavy broken beats. Produced by doseone & Bob Larder the soundtrack bubbles and bounces across 30 tracks and a dozen musical genre's.

GANGS BEASTS Original Soundtrack is from the Independent Video Game GANG BEASTS, savor it's punchy pop sounds at home, at work or at play. GANG BEASTS is created by BONELOAF and published by Double Fine Productions.

01 GANG BEASTS DAYS
02 CONTAINERS OF JOY
03 SUBWAY SLY
04 WHEEL II ELECTRIC BOOGALOO
05 CHUTES AHOY
06 COOLING DAWN
07 GONDOLA GETDOWN
08 BUOY BEAUTIFUL
09 FANS FOREVER
10 GRIND ON

12 BLIMP FLIP
13 INCINERATOR SONATA
14 GIRDERS EDGE
15 BEEF CITY
16 GANG BEASTS NIGHTS

18 SUBWAY AIR
19 WHEEL REAL
20 CHUTES LOOSE

23 BUOY BOUNCE
24 FANS GLAM
25 GRIND GRIND GRIND
26 TRUCKS TWANG
27 BLIMP DRIFT
28 INCINERATOR SUITE
29 GIRDERS WILD
30 BEEF CITY HUSTLE

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Most Linux distributions should work)
  • Storage: 141 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Storage: 141 MB available space
